devdoc.author: Utkir Sobirov <sobirovutkir@gmail.io>

BatchDelegated(address,bytes,bool).details: Emitted when the single batch is delegated

delegateBatch(address,uint256,address[],.details: Use `hashDelegatedBatch` to create sender message payload. `GatewayRecipient` context api: `_getContextAccount` will return `account` arg `_getContextSender` will return recovered address from `senderSignature` arg

delegateBatchGuarded(address,uint256,add.details: Use `hashDelegatedBatch` to create sender message payload. `GatewayRecipient` context api: `_getContextAccount` will return `account` arg `_getContextSender` will return recovered address from `senderSignature` arg

delegateBatchWithGasPrice(address,uint25.details: Use `hashDelegatedBatchWithGasPrice` to create sender message payload (tx.gasprice as gasPrice) `GatewayRecipient` context api: `_getContextAccount` will return `account` arg `_getContextSender` will return recovered address from `senderSignature` arg

delegateBatchWithGasPriceGuarded(address.details: Use `hashDelegatedBatchWithGasPrice` to create sender message payload (tx.gasprice as gasPrice) `GatewayRecipient` context api: `_getContextAccount` will return `account` arg `_getContextSender` will return recovered address from `senderSignature` arg

delegateBatches(bytes[],bool).details: It will revert when all batches fail

delegateBatchesGuarded(bytes[],bool).details: It will revert when all batches fail

sendBatch(address[],bytes[]).details: `GatewayRecipient` context api: `_getContextAccount` will return `msg.sender` `_getContextSender` will return `msg.sender`

sendBatchFromAccount(address,address[],b.details: `GatewayRecipient` context api: `_getContextAccount` will return `account` arg `_getContextSender` will return `msg.sender`

sendBatchFromAccountGuarded(address,addr.details: `GatewayRecipient` context api: `_getContextAccount` will return `account` arg `_getContextSender` will return `msg.sender`

sendBatchGuarded(address[],bytes[]).details: `GatewayRecipient` context api: `_getContextAccount` will return `msg.sender` `_getContextSender` will return `msg.sender`

devdoc.title: Gateway V2 with guarded batching functions

delegateBatchGuarded(address,uint256,add.notice: Delegates guarded batch from the account

delegateBatchWithGasPrice(address,uint25.notice: Delegates batch from the account (with gas price)

delegateBatchWithGasPriceGuarded(address.notice: Delegates guarded batch from the account (with gas price)

sendBatchFromAccountGuarded(address,addr.notice: Sends guarded batch from the account
